thread.title: Luke Simms

author: Luke Simms
title: Luke Simms
text: Tyres fitted on time on Tuesday. Fitter was polite and well educated and took great care whilst fitting the tyres. There was a slighte issue with a valve which I found to be leaking causing the tyre to deflate. Called up and spoke to a lovely member of staff who got someone out to sort out the valve today. Great service all round and a pleasure to deal with. Highly recommend!!!
